title: Look
lyrics:
Eodil bwa yeogil bwa naega ap-e issjanh-a
Ttansaeng-gaghaneun ge da nun-e boineunde
Gwaenhi geogjeong haji ma
Naega yeop-e iss-eo jul tenikka
Don’t worry naleul mid-eo



Yeah, yeah, yeah

Ajigdo moleugessni

Bul-anhae boineun neoui nunbich

Ready, ready, begin nae nun-e ppajyeobwa hurry

Don’t you worry, we can make it, make it



Dulyeoum-i millyeoomyeon just naleul bwabwa

Neoleul hyanghan mid-eum-i very neomchinikka

Don’t be afraid mam-i seobseobhaejinikka

Geujeo gat-eun ma-eum-igil balanikka



Neukkyeojineun nae moseub geudaelo nal

Mid-eojullae dulyeoul pil-yo eobs-euni

Geu nun sog-eseo naleul chajgo sip-eo

Balabwajwo geulae geuleohge



You look at me now

Oh siseon-eul majchugo

Igsughaejil ttaekkaji naman boil ttaekkaji



Nun dollijima

I daelo nun majchwojwo

Nuga mwola handaedo ulil tte noh-eul sun eobs-eo



Gwichanh-eun so-eum-eun kkeodugil bala

My, my eyes on you

Meolis-sog-eul biwo just for me teongteong



Eochapi nan ojig neoppun believe it

Your eyes on me

Ne siseon-eul only naegeman dwo



Daeche neoneun geogjeong haneun sigan eolmana doeneun geoya question

Naneun neoleul goelobhineun geosdeulgwaui jeontuleul junbi jung-iya yes, sir



Ne gibun-e ttala nae gibundo byeonham

Seulpeohaneun ne moseub-e neomuna yeol bad-a

Baegsajang-e padocheoleom da jiwobeolyeo

Neoui gomin no more ije haengbogman nam-eungeol



Gwaenchanh-a gakkeum jamsi meomchishaedo

Gomin an hae igyeo nael geola mid-euni

Amu ildo eobs-eossdeon geoscheoleom nal

Balabwajwo geulae geuleohge



You look at me now

Oh siseon-eul majchugo

Igsughaejil ttaekkaji naman boil ttaekkaji



Nun dollijima

I daelo nun majchwojwo

Nuga mwola handaedo ulil tte noh-eul sun eobs-eo



Hamkke hago sip-eo modeun geol

Naeil-eul saeng-gaghago seololeul balabogo

Neolo gadeug chan nae mam-eul ajig moleugessdamyeon



You look at me now

Oh siseon-eul majchugo

Igsughaejil ttaekkaji naman boil ttaekkaji



Nun dollijima

I daelo nun majchwojwo

Nuga mwola handaedo ulil tte noh-eul sun eobs-eo



Gwichanh-eun so-eum-eun kkeodugil bala

My, my eyes on you

Meolis-sog-eul biwo just for me teongteong



Eochapi nan ojig neoppun believe it

Your eyes on me

Ne siseon-eul only naegeman dwo
